Amendment.text: 000: Schedule 4, page 171, line 33, at end insert—the quality of the care and early education offered by the early years providers registered with the agency,”

text.quote: 000: Clause 76, page 52, line 25, at end insert—

“( ) The Secretary of State must, within four years of the coming into force of subsection (1), conduct a review of the impact of removal of section 11 of the Childcare Act 2006 on the sufficiency of childcare in England.
text.IndentOne: (a) lay a copy of the report before Parliament, and
(b) publish the report in such a manner as they think fit.”
